We are 5 star Airbnb frequent users. We generally don’t write negative reviews and were going to let this one go but have reason to believe the host wrote a false and defamatory review of us.
We stayed here for 3 days as a result of a car accident that stranded us in Elkhart, KS - far off the beaten path. The host tried to collect $455 in additional cleaning fees as a result of our dogs - the place purported to be pet friendly.
Here’s the truth: This property has a “pool” of standing, rancid, brackish water in the backyard. The yard is also full of dead animals and old dog poop. The place has cement floors so it’s not really possible for dogs to do any real damage.
The host was aggressive and called us a series of names when we refused the baseless cleaning up charge. Among them: that we were not adults, not responsible dog owners, liars etc. Read our other reviews and you can determine for yourself whether what the impolite host here said is true.
Also: When we checked in the place looked like it hadn’t been cleaned at all let alone Covid cleaned. Dirty dishes in the dishwasher and old coffee and filter in the coffee pot.
Again, since we were essentially stuck here with nowhere else to go, we weren’t going to complain. But when the host makes up a story, calls you names, and trys to take advantage, we are not going to be silent.
Everyone else we met in Elkhart, KS was a pleasure. The host here was not.
